name: SurvivingThroatCancer
0:
”Alexa, open Surviving Throat Cancer”
”Alexa, start Surviving Throat Cancer”
”Alexa, ask Surviving Throat Cancer to give me a tip.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: surviving throat cancer
Developer Terms of Use
des: Surviving Throat Cancer is a skill dedicated to helping people prevent and survive throat cancer, HPV-related cancer and head and neck cancers. It is developed and narrated by Jason Mendelsohn, aka SupermanHPV, who is a survivor of Stage IV HPV cancer. He gives tips for prevention, treatment, caregiving, and survival. Please note: This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number. To get started listening to Jason's tips, simply ask Alexa to open Surviving Throat Cancer.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
